titles: The Belgicke pismire stinging the slothfull sleeper, and avvaking the diligent to fast, watch, pray; and worke out their owne temporall and eternall salvation with feare and trembling.
author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.
notes: With reference to the Low Countries and the marriage of Prince Charles to the Infanta of Spain.
The imprint is false; actual place of publication from STC.
In this edition A3r line 9 has "vvisedome".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
